name: Arousing Sexual Stories: Risu's Initial Mission
name_original: Arousing Sexual Stories: Risu's Initial Mission
description:
Arousing Sexual Stories: Risu's Initial Mission, or ASS:RIM for short, is my third hentai game that I'm developing.

In this game, you play as my Squirrel Girl OC, Risu Nutkins, as she finds herself in a mysterious laboratory. While trying to find a way out of the lab she gets help from a mysterious character, and has to journey through multiple different areas to reach her goal. Can you help her to reach her goal, or will the lewd temptations be too much for Risu?

(This version of the game has a few placeholder tracks of music that are default RPG Maker tracks, these will be replaced with future updates)

Music by iamzo3y & multimokia on Twitter

03/02/2022 - First Demo Release version 0.1.1
